name: Essentia Pura™ Cannabigerol CBG Isolate Powder
description: Essentia Pura™ Cannabigerol CBG isolate is also produced from industrial hemp (Cannabis Sativa L.) and contains more than 98% of CBG. The product comes in a crystalline (powder) form, which makes it extremely easy to work with as an ingredient. With greater than 98% CBG potency, small particle size and a mild natural terpene flavor and odor, CBG isolate is the ideal way to introduce this highly-valued cannabinoid to any consumer-good product. Essentia Pura™ CBG isolate powder can be used globally, as it is a completely Tetrahydrocannabinol-free product.
